about.subtitle: Our Story
about.p1: Nestled in the heart of the city, Aurum has been a beacon of culinary artistry since 2010. Our philosophy is simple — honor the ingredient, respect the craft, and create moments that linger.
about.p2: Chef Elena Marchetti brings over two decades of experience from kitchens across Italy, France, and Japan, weaving global influences into every thoughtfully composed plate.
